/usr/local/cuda-11.7/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --expt-extended-lambda -rdc=true -O3 -DNDEBUG --generate-code=arch=compute_75,code=[compute_75,sm_75] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/test_G2Miner.dir/test/test_G2Miner_generated_test_G2Miner.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/test_G2Miner.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-11.7/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.7/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  /usr/local/cuda-11.7/lib64/libcudart_static.a -ldl -lrt  -lglog -lgflags -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lpthread
